Package org.mcm.sws.pddl

Provides for a PDDL parser and for various classes that capture the information of PDDL formulas.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
PDDLFormulaeParserConstants  
 

Class Summary
ActionInstance An ActionInstance holds information about a web service operation and the concrete parameters to call that information.
Atom An atom (P t1,...
Comparison a comparison formula, as needed for PDDL2.1 Level 2
Conjunction a conjunction of formulas.
Disjunction a disjunction of formulas.
ExistsFormula an existential quantification formula.
ForallFormula a universal quantification formula.
Formula The abstract superclass of all Formula objects.
Function A Funcion (PDDL 2.1 level 2)
FunctionDefinition Function def.
Implication a material implication (antecedent ==> consequence), where both antecedent and consequence are formulas.
Literal A literal is an atom (P t1,...
Name A constant.
NegAtom A negated atom
NumericAssignment  
NumericComparison  
NumericFormula  
NumericOperation  
NumericValue  
PDDLFormulaeParser A PDDL parser that supports namespace-prefixed predicates.
PDDLFormulaeParserTokenManager  
Predicate A predicate symbol.
QuantifiedFormula An abstract superclass for both types of quantified formulas.
RelationDefinition an abstact superclass for the definition of predicate and function symbols.
Requirements This class stores a unique set of PDDL-style requirements, which might be required by a certain problem or which may be provided by a certain planner.
SimpleCharStream An implementation of interface CharStream, where the stream is assumed to contain only ASCII characters (without unicode processing).
Term A superclass for both names (i.e. constants) and variables.
Token Describes the input token stream.
TypeDefinition Definition of type.
Variable A variable to be used in formulas that are not ground.
WhenFormula A formula representing conditional effects.
XMLFormulaParser  
 

Exception Summary
ParseException This exception is thrown when parse errors are encountered.
 

Error Summary
TokenMgrError  
 

Package org.mcm.sws.pddl Description

Provides for a PDDL parser and for various classes that capture the information of PDDL formulas.
